title: TextUtils
desc: textUtils is basic text utilities services where we can perform some action on strings and count words, space, characters etc.

title: News App
desc: This is a news web app created by react library by using news api. In this project developer api is used so we have to download source code and run this project by 'npm start' to run this web app
